Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption capacity: ≈2 mmol g−1 at 298 K and 1 bar when activated at 200 °C; enhanced to 3.5 mmol g−1 when activated at 300 °C.
Negligible uptake observed (≈2 mg g−1) when activated at 300 °C.

Sieving Mechanism: Selective molecular exclusion based on kinetic diameter difference

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Retention time: 12.9 min per gram of adsorbent for propylene; produced 99.5% pure propylene from a 5/95 propane/propylene mixture.

Other Information.Additional Info: Synthesis scalable; high thermal and hydrothermal stability; charge-balancing cations (dimethylammonium) influence pore aperture size.
